body:
When I put my account info into the launcher it just says username or password is incorrect, which they're not (0/4 would work).

Does anyone else have/had this problem?

Here are some screenshots (you might have to copy and paste into search bar)

Before with Thomas_Shoe:  http://i.imgur.com/7hzvHOt.png  
After with Thomas_Shoe:   http://imgur.com/q1yWSDW 
 
Before with other account:  http://imgur.com/qn9K8v9
After with same account:  http://imgur.com/hDikgja

Someone smart help!!!

title: Why can't I get into Minecraft? Help please.

replies.body: Maybe you are entering the wrong password?
replies.body_tagged: Maybe you are entering the wrong password?

replies.body: Im not matic and glitchy what does that mean

replies.body:
No need for the rudeness.


On my account, when logging in, I have to use the email that my account is assigned to. Try doing that.

No need for the rudeness.

replies.body: Yes I have the same problem with my account and my other 2 alts. I did some research and something like this has happened before. It's just that the minecraft login servers are down for a little. Just give it some time and it should work soon.
